title: Star Guardian skin music that plays during the first minute of loading into the game
body:
there is no more music for the first minute?? because I love it and want it back rly bad plz
(I have star guardian janna)

replies.body: Im actually glad it's gone. It was honestly so cringey because it reminded me of all the anime freaks who acted as if they are a anime character. That's just my opinion though :P
Glad its gone filthy anime weeaboo music hyper garbage

Maybe its a limited time thing, like all skins will get music then after that only jinx gets music... and then when more star guardian skins come out next year "hopefully" there will be music for all skins
maybe it's like Jhin, when you pick Jhin with no skin he has his own custom eerie music in the first minute of the game, but it happens sometimes not all the time

> [{quoted}](name=xDarkRavenx,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=oITElPVc,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2016-10-23T13:44:46.603+0000)
>
> maybe it's like Jhin, when you pick Jhin with no skin he has his own custom eerie music in the first minute of the game, but it happens sometimes not all the time

Jhin's music always works for me (with both skin and no skin)
Do you have your actual music sound on? Worked for me
It usually plays all the time for me when I use Star Guardian Jinx, but I didn't hear it when I used Star Guardian Lux.
Someone has to be using a Star Guardian skin.
oh I forgot to mention I am talking about when I use star guardian janna skin, no music plays

> [{quoted}](name=TestTrilogy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=oITElPVc,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-10-08T15:44:04.766+0000)
>
> oh I forgot to mention I am talking about when I use star guardian janna skin, no music plays

I think it works like the Project skins. You need a certain amount of things. Ward +1, skin +1, icon +1.

Edit: Music always plays when Jinx is using her skin.

Not true. I have the icon. the ward and the jinx skin. and it only played the first time. Subsequently it never played. EVen when i had a support lulu star guardian. Played star guardian lux with a star gurdian jinx and it also didnt play
Yeah I noticed it too so cool wish it could be an option to have on for the whole game
its actually so bad like i cant even turn it off either
